topic.title: Music Library Association Best Practices for dimensions

div.p: except for online resources. For additional guidance and examples for certain types of audio and video carriers, see .
field 300 subfield $c. Also, optionally: field 340 subfield $b.
Do not consider this condition to apply to single- or multiple-sheet scores or parts intended to be read as leaves or pages. Refer to the instructions at Volumes.
for scores and parts of conventional (portrait) orientation. Otherwise apply the instructions at Volumes.
For notated music resources, refer first to the instructions at Notated music.
Also consider these instructions to apply to notated music resources.

For notated music issued as two or more nested folded sheets, or one or more nested folded sheets with one or more unfolded sheets in the middle, and intended to be read as consecutive pages, apply the instructions at Volumes.
If carriers of the same type are of different sizes, use cataloger's judgment in deciding the order.

Record dimensions of a carrier in field 300 $c following the extent of that same carrier in 300 $a. Record carriers of different sizes in separate 300 fields; alternatively, record separate occurrences of $c and $a within the same 300 field.
